Creates and manages an AWS XRay Sampling Rule.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = new Aws.Xray.SamplingRule("example", new Aws.Xray.SamplingRuleArgs
        {
            Attributes = 
            {
                { "Hello", "Tris" },
            },
            FixedRate = 0.05,
            Host = "*",
            HttpMethod = "*",
            Priority = 10000,
            ReservoirSize = 1,
            ResourceArn = "*",
            RuleName = "example",
            ServiceName = "*",
            ServiceType = "*",
            UrlPath = "*",
            Version = 1,
        });
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws/xray"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := xray.NewSamplingRule(ctx, "example", &xray.SamplingRuleArgs{
			Attributes: pulumi.StringMap{
				"Hello": pulumi.String("Tris"),
			},
			FixedRate:     pulumi.Float64(0.05),
			Host:          pulumi.String("*"),
			HttpMethod:    pulumi.String("*"),
			Priority:      pulumi.Int(10000),
			ReservoirSize: pulumi.Int(1),
			ResourceArn:   pulumi.String("*"),
			RuleName:      pulumi.String("example"),
			ServiceName:   pulumi.String("*"),
			ServiceType:   pulumi.String("*"),
			UrlPath:       pulumi.String("*"),
			Version:       pulumi.Int(1),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

    <dd>{{% md %}}Matches the `origin` that the service uses to identify its type in segments.
